name: Vampy
description:
Vampy  --> A Shooting Vampire Filled Game Made With Python

The game revolves around the fact that the player needs to dodge the blood which is spit by the vampires as blood is lethal to the player. The player even has a gun which can kill the vampires. There are 2 settings for the game: Day and Night. During the night the player tries to save himself from becoming a vampire. During the night, the player can heal himself by choosing the correct flower. Remember: The Correct Flower Gets Randomly Chosen Every Day. 

This game was made under 3 days, the entire source code is available on my github page JayceFR/Vampy (github.com)

Controls: The player can move around with W-A-S-D keys or Arrow keys. You can aim and shoot with left click. 

Credits: A huge thanks to Janish Jason (my younger brother) for creating amazing arts and a spooky background music.
